Class Auction_RemoteService

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • Auction_RemoteService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote, Server_Interface

    public class Auction_RemoteService
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements Server_Interface
    This class represents the front-end Server of the auctioning system that connect all the cluster members to the channel to execute the requests made on the server.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        startingPrice - The starting price of the item
